name: Sleepless (MorganH)
description:
The Dream Realm has been attacked by the evil Sand Witch and her nightmare creatures! Traverse through the Dream Realm with fluid platformer movement using your pillow as a tool to scale walls, activate switches, jump across gaps and defeat enemies.

------------------------------------

Sleepless is my Final year University Project. This is also my first real game! Made from the ground up in Construct.

Sharing is greatly appreciated!
